column4: I am trying to run the 8.04 live cd and once i get past hte options i get "out of range" on my monitor. after attempting to change the vga settigns manually, i've come to ask for suggestions
other than the vga (f4) option nothing. i'm at a loss
8.04 doesn't make it easy on us.  They took away our prime tool for configuring display.
: it appears tokenbad (who i was helping too) has found some one who is working on it with him. thank you for your time :)
what tools are available, require a gui.  Which of course you don't have. :)
